_header: In my defense god me defend
Subjects: Christ, prayers to; prayers, to Christ
_description: A simple prayer to the Son of God — one quatrain

NLS3473.Transcription:
In my defence god me defendand In my (miste) god me sendWheir I
                    ame sit and Lyk(tid) [cropped]The sonne of god I (ats A) ynd

Stevenson,  George. 
             Pieces from the Makculloch and the Gray MSS. together with The Chepman
                and Myllar Prints.
